attributes.action: introduce legislation to repeal the british law regarding bigamy and arrange the issue of Royal Pardons' to every british subject alive or dead who has been convicted and sentenced for bigamy.  Additionally, organise payment of substantial financial compensation to those people who have previously been tried and sentenced for bigamous activity which, now, apparently is acceptable in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Muslims are receiving special treatment, yet again, by not being prosecuted when they declare they have more than one wife - which means the laws over bigamy are being ignored.  If the law is being ignored then it should be removed.  If it is not to be removed then it needs to be upheld, regardless of religion of the law-breaker.
